solution_line_template: At ${price_increase_per_bid} per bid, there were {total_price_increase} / {price_increase_per_bid} = <<{total_price_increase}/{price_increase_per_bid}={total_bids}>>{total_bids} bids on the desk.
There were two bidders, so each bid {total_bids} / {number_of_bidders} = <<{total_bids}/{number_of_bidders}={bids_per_person}>>{bids_per_person} times on the desk.
